results.content_html:
The course coverage is good, even excellent. But the lecturer is a) Too fast at times and b) does a horrible job at explaining concepts or why he is doing it.
For example: makes a sort function and puts code in like this: var sortedData = this.state.departmentsWithoutFilter.sort(function(a,b){
if (asc)
{
return (a[prop]>b[prop])?1:((a[prop] }
})
With no rhyme or reason. The code he writes works, but I have no understanding of why it works, what I am setting out to do. It just lacks context.

results.content: it was good but the host could have been a bit slower in explaining stuff
